snippet: President Obama has come to consider the solitary hours after dark as essential as his time in the Oval Office. Barely getting five hours of sleep a night, he considers the time alone more important....
abstract: Pres Obama has come to rely on, and even treasure, long, solitary hours spent after dark in Oval Office; Obama, self-described night owl, uses time alone for speech-writing, examining briefings and reading letters from citizens.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has come to consider the solitary hours after dark as essential as his time in the Oval Office. Barely getting five hours of sleep a night, he considers the time alone more important.

headline.main: Obama After Dark: The Precious Hours Alone
headline.print_headline: Obama at Night: 7 Almonds and Some Precious Solitude
